## Source: ossf-package-analysis (42e8fed5a27a6a36519ad623fa6c33db0f7824fc859500c5f049ec26347c2b3c)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'req-matplotlib' @ 11.2.18 (pypi) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:
- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
